rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {DIS1911, FIT1033} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}

description: FIT3169 introduces students to immersive environment design and production principles using game engine prototyping software. Building upon the 3D creation and editing skills in the prerequisite unit FIT1033 Foundations of 3D, students will learn how to create game levels, import assets (models, sounds, animations), extend supplied code (JavaScript) to visualise interactive virtual environments for a range of applications and devices.
